diff_hunk:
@@ -186,6 +252,24 @@ message OperatorDef {
   // This is an optional string with no assumed characteristics as
   // operators can be constructed in any language.
   optional string debug_info = 10;
+
+  // place for additional information
+  // for example, for some training platform, if they want to tag the
+  // operator for placing strategy, component info and parallel strategy,
+  // such information is not about the model/operator itself, but about
+  // the runtime/platform.
+  // existing solution is saving extra info in device option,
+  // however, it's more natural to keep the information here
+  // existing usage: https://fb.quip.com/yAiuAXkRXZGx
+  repeated Argument annotations = 13;
+
+  // each operator is has its own version number.
+  // operator version information
+  // each time, we change the API or semantics of the operator,
+  // we bump the version for the operator.
+  // the runtime system should check the op_version of each OperatorDef
+  // and decide it should reject or accept the model
+  optional string op_version = 15;
body: I use string, because originally, I want to embed the domain with version together in this field. I should add `domain` field to make it clear here.
body_html: I use string, because originally, I want to embed the domain with version together in this field. I should add domain field to make it clear here.
body_text: I use string, because originally, I want to embed the domain with version together in this field. I should add domain field to make it clear here.
